mapper.select: select * from reply where rb_no=#{rb_no} order by reply_no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from reply where rb_no=#{rb_no}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (rb_no, reply_content, reply_writer) values (#{rb_no},#{reply_content},#{reply_writer})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_update = now() where reply_no=#{reply_no}
